column4: Gaim with IRC takes up less memory than Gaim and Xchat at once. :P
i agree, i've started using gaim for irc lately too
google for a handy script called "getwinex"
sudo is not exactly a ubuntu invention. on any distro you should set it up first thing
i believe you. root doesn't need breaks :)
kde is quite nice too, for those who like that sort of thing. k3b could never be in gnome anyway, it's not very compliant to the HIG :)
we need the functionality, but we definitely need a better UI. coaster might do it once the library is working
i guess patrick might be wise to not support gnome. he's such a lonely rider. how much can a man do?
gaim can live on a remote box, but it needs your local x i'm afraid
i'd run irssi in that situation
i sometimes run remote irssi on my phone :)
they do have some good news on their site: "e17 lives!" :)
